h1: How Many Calories in a Pepperoni Pizza?
assumptions: Standard 12-inch medium pepperoni pizza with cheese, tomato sauce, and pepperoni slices; hand-tossed crust, typical fast-food style.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, crust type, toppings amount, and preparation; check labels or apps for specific products.

quick_answer.text: A typical 12-inch pepperoni pizza contains about 2500 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pepperoni pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 300-400 kcal per slice (1/8 of a 12-inch pizza), depending on size.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Roughly 300 g carbs, 100 g protein, 100 g fat for a whole medium pizza.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 5000 mg sodium per pizza from cheese, sauce, and meat.

faqs.q: How does pizza size affect calories?
faqs.a: Small (10-inch) ≈1800 kcal; large (14-inch) ≈3500 kcal; scale by diameter squared.

faqs.q: Are there lower-calorie pepperoni pizza options?
faqs.a: Opt for thin crust, less cheese, or cauliflower crust to reduce by 200-500 kcal.
